paragraphs.first: Hello, I'm Jeferson Reis, passionate about technology, design, and programming. Over the years, I've developed skills as a full-stack developer, graphic designer, and IT technician. I'm always looking for new challenges to create innovative and customized solutions, combining technology and creativity.
paragraphs.second: I have experience with React and Node.js, focusing on performance and user experience (UX/UI). Additionally, I specialize in graphic design, creating unique visual identities and customized graphic materials.

web.description: Specialist in creating high-impact web experiences. I develop conversion-optimized Landing Pages, Corporate Websites with strategic narratives, robust E-commerce platforms, and professional Blogs. I guarantee exclusive design, total responsiveness, and SEO optimization for maximum visibility.

design.title: Strategic Design & Branding
design.description: Specialized in creating visual identities that establish authority in the market. I develop complete branding systems, including distinctive logos, consistent visual communication, and strategic advertising materials that consolidate your brand's positioning.

documentation.title: Specialized Corporate Documentation
documentation.description: Specialist in transforming concepts into high-standard executive documentation. I produce corporate presentations, strategic business documents, advanced analytical spreadsheets, executive resumes, and academic documents with rigorous formatting standards.

modeling.title: 3D Modeling & Architectural Visualization
modeling.description: Specialist in creating high-precision 3D content. I develop complex three-dimensional models, hyper-realistic renderings, technical animations, and optimized assets for augmented and virtual reality. Projects executed with precision for 3D printing and professional visualization.

support.title: Specialized Consulting & Technical Support
support.description: I offer comprehensive technical solutions for IT infrastructure: system optimization, advanced data recovery, preventive and corrective maintenance. Personalized remote or on-site service, ensuring maximum operational efficiency.

video.title: Audiovisual Production & Motion Design
video.description: Specialist in corporate audiovisual production. I execute professional editing, advanced post-production, corporate motion graphics, and technical animations using the professional Adobe suite. Productions optimized for multiple platforms: social media, digital marketing, corporate presentations, and dynamic branding.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or interact with jefersonreis.dev website.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: When you visit the site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including:

items.contact: Contact information: name, email, message (when you use the contact form)
items.usage: Usage information: pages visited, time spent on site, links clicked
items.cookies: Cookies and similar technologies: to enhance your browsing experience

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to:

items.communication: Communicate with you when requested through the contact form
items.improvement: Improve and optimize my website and services
items.analytics: Analyze how visitors navigate and interact with the site

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and delivering services, provided they agree to keep this information confidential.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, please remember that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: Right to access the personal data I hold about you
items.rectification: Right to rectify or update your personal data
items.deletion: Right to request deletion of your personal data
items.objection: Right to object to processing of your personal data
